column4: Newbie question: Do email clients each have their own particular file formats, and if yes, how do I commit to one?
Of course I've googled around...I'm really wondering if it's easy to convert between formats if I need to change clients.

most clients can use maildir and/or mbox, so choose either one & you're gtg in most cases..  maildir = every mail is its own file, accounts are organized in directories; mbox = every mail account's content is saved as one file
